QuestData.Title: Core of Our Troubles
QuestData.Description: Elementals are chaotic by nature, but dis kind of organized aggression is out of character. More so down here where dere deaths be a bit more permanent. I suspect dis is Therazane the Stonemother's doin', but I have to be sure.$B$BDestroy da Irestone Rumblers and bring me their cores. We'll be settlin' here and now if dis is da Stonemother's hatred brought down on us.
QuestData.CompletionText: We've never been claimin' a great friendship with da Elemental Lords, but we still be trustin' in a bit of security in da chaos. As long as dey be remainin' unorganized, we've been havin' little to fear.$B$BIf the Stonemother is truly rallyin' da earth against us, we be havin' a great deal more to be fearin'.
QuestData.RewardText: Dese are in surprisingly good condition - good work, mon.
